mapper.update: update teacher set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, college_id = #{collegeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, password, code, college_id, remark from teacher
